Room.Name: The Magical Garden
Room.ShortDescription: You are just to the south of the gate by which you entered.
Room.LongDescription: You stand a short walk to the south of the gate which so rudely closed behind you upon entering the magical garden. There is a path which leads to the north and south, but if no one is looking, you can hop over a row of strange looking flowers to the west or climb over a tranquil little brook to the east which comes out of nowhere and probably ends nowhere also. To the south you see a statue which stands in a small clearing.
